content: --रात्रिः, --रात्री {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {1} a dark night. {2} a sister of Yama. {3} the Amāvasyā on which lamps are lighted (in the Divālī holidays). {4} the night of destruction at the end of the world (identified with Durgā). {5} a particular night in the life of man, on the 7th day of the 7th month of the 77th year.
